Wings: A full pound of hand breaded chicken wings with buffalo, smoky sweet dry rub, bbq, or spicy honey garlic sauce
Chicken Tenders: crispy breaded chicken served buffalo style, smoky sweet dry rub, bbq or spicy honey garlic
Black Bean Quesadilla: fresh veggies, cilantro cheddar jack cheese, toasted cumin and black beans served w/ sour cream & pico de gallo
Fried Pickles: sour and crispy served with buttermilk ranch
Irish Nachos: house fried potato chips, cheddar, bacon, fresh scallions, jalapenos and sour cream
GoGo Bites: deep fried bites filled with jalapenos, roasted corn, bacon & cream cheese, deep fried and served with BBQ drizzle
Fried Green Beans: dusted with parmesan, served w/ sundried tomato aioli
Pemi Dip: creamy bacon dip w/ a 3 cheese blend, whole grain mustard, caramelized onion and scallions served w/warm soft pretzel bites

Chili: served w/ cheese and green onion
Harvest Salad: baby spinach, local apples, goat cheese, bacon, candied walnuts, red onion, tossed in apple cider dressing
Greek Wedge: romaine heart wedge, cucumbers, kalamata olives, red onion, pepperoncini, cherry tomato, feta served w/Greek dressing
Garden Salad: cucumbers, tomatoes, carrots, red onions, peppers and croutons on mixed greens

Public House: mozzarella, pesto, feta, sliced tomatoes, roasted garlic, salami
Meat Flatbread: red sauce, mozzarella, pepperoni, salami, bacon
BLT Flatbread: pemi dip base, bacon, tomatoes, chopped spinach, spicy mayo drizzle
BBQ Chicken Flatbread: ranch, shredded chicken, mozzarella, cheddar, bacon, bbq, onions
Build Your Own Flatbread: Toppings: pepperoni, shredded chicken, buffalo shredded chicken, bacon, salami, onions, peppers, tomatoes, mushrooms, roasted garlic, feta, pesto

subtitle: Served w/house potato chips and a pickle.  Substitute hand cut fries or house salad for $2, truffle fries for $2.50. Add a side salad or a cup of soup to any Sandwich for $3.  Add a cup of chili for $3.50. Substitute a gluten free roll to any sandwich for $1

Chicken Sandwich: grilled chicken w/ cheddar, bacon, lettuce, tomato & onion, garlic aioli. Served on a brioche roll
Lulu's Big Dog: quarter pound hot dog on grilled brioche bun with sautéed peppers & onions, stone ground mustard
Pemi Sliders*: 2 angus beef patties topped with cheddar, bacon, garlic aioli, lettuce & tomato, on grilled brioche.  Served w/hand cut fries
Quinoa 'Burger': red quinoa, lentil and roasted garlic “burger” w/baby spinach, goat cheese, red onion, sundried tomato basil aioli on brioche roll
Steak Bomb: lean grilled shaved steak, peppers, onions, mushrooms, pepperoni & cheddar with garlic aioli on toasted french roll
Banh Mi: slow roasted pork, pickled carrots, thin sliced cucumbers, jalapenos & fresh cilantro w/ spicy mayo, served on toasted french roll
Beyond Burger: pea protein burger that satisfies and tastes like beef!  Served on grilled brioche with lettuce, onion, and tomato

subtitle: Add a side salad or a cup of soup to any meal for $3 or a cup of chili for $3.50

Asian Chicken: marinated chicken over vegetable slaw, finished with sweet soy glaze and sesame seeds. Served with chilled lo mein salad
Caprese Chicken: grilled chicken topped with fresh mozzarella, fresh basil & roasted cherry tomatoes. Served w/veg of the day and baked potato
Baked Mac & Cheese: cavatappi pasta in three cheese sauce topped with buttered ritz crumbs
Tom's Chicken Pot Pie: tender chunks of chicken with potatoes, peas, carrots and onions topped with puffed pastry
Shepard's Pie: the Pemi’s twist on a classic - seasoned ground beef in a merlot gravy with carrots, peas and onions topped and baked with whipped potatoes
Beer Battered Fish & Chips: beer battered haddock, hand cut fries, tartar
Naan Tacos: pulled chicken, cotija cheese, roasted corn salsa, pico de gallo, chipotle lime sour cream on mini naan
Try it veg style! (sub black beans for chicken)

LA’s Bourbon Sour: bulleit, fresh lemon, local maple syrup, luxardo cherry
Sinner: pbr hard coffee, peanut butter whiskey, on the rocks
Dirty Unicorn: cucumber mint vodka, lemonade, tonic, empress indigo gin
Mule Barrell: jim beam black, cider, pumpkin spices, ginger beer
Skinny Margarita: hornitos silver, fresh lime, cointreau (try it with blackberry!)
Honey Badger: casamigos reposado, grapefruit, honey, aperol, cinnamon rim
